metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3172 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in tree.php in Cacti 0.8.8g and earlier allowsremote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via theparent_id parameter in an item_edit action.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3172` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.2').
